name: One Room Saloon
description:
Play in Fullscreen or the text is cut off!

Made for a 2-day game jam. Themes to pick from were: "One Minute" "Western" or "One Room" so I decided to go with all three.

This is a precision 3D platformer game with a very tight timer.

The downloadable .exe plays a bit better in my opinion due to weirdness with WebGL and mouse capture.
